price: 30. Waxaa soo diray Sulaymaan, (waxaana ku yaal): Bismillaahir Raxmaanir Raxiim.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
